result.execSummary:
All charges against Jessy Richard Card in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jessy Richard Card is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jessy Richard Card

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Jessy Richard Card
Current: 2011 215th, Centuria, WI 54824 United States  (Effective: 10-06-2022)
Prior: 207 Church Street, #2, Audubon, IA 50025

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, any Kwik Trip store.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

2:09 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Brian Thomas Smestad in court for State of Wisconsin, Defendant Jessy Richard Card in court. DE does not qualify for public defender, files PFAC. Court reviews PFAC and approves, orders repayments of $100/mo. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands. NG. Court sets bond. DE states that he has already been charged regarding this offense. ADA Smestad will review other cases. Court sets SETC and PSC. Adjourned: 2:16 PM. kma
